paper.title: ACCENTUATING THE IMPACTS OF POLITICAL NEWS ON THE STOCK PRICE, WORKING CAPITAL AND PERFORMANCE: AN EMPIRICAL REVIEW OF EMERGING ECONOMY
paper.abstract: There is a paucity of academic studies on the impact of political news on stock returns, working capital, and firm performance. This study looks into the impact of previous political news on stock behavior in the future. For the empirical analysis, we used a data set of Pakistani non-financial listed firms from 2009 to 2018. We found a substantial positive effect of political news on the future stock returns, working capital, and firm performance using a portfolio, panel, and two-stage least square regression approach.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究政治新闻对股票回报、营运资本和公司绩效的影响，虽然使用了回归分析方法，但其核心研究内容并不直接涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
